attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In keeping with ancient traditions of Albion, we implore the Prime Minister to adopt a no-clothes policy during sessions of Parliament for all Members of the House.

On the Equinoxes, all Members would be required to paint themselves in blue woad and offer up sacrifices to Almighty Woden and the Queen of the Sea before undertaking business, to ensure a fruitful outcome.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
